attributes.action: We ask the goverment to stop persecuting the motorist and get rid of all fuel duty and allow us to reclaim our roads now.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We ask the goverment to stop persecuting the motorist and get rid of all fuel duty and allow us to reclaim our roads now.

rejection.details:
There are a number of other petitions already in existence that you may wish to add your name to:

http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/Motorists-speak
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/MotoristsFuel
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/MultipleCarTax
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
